name: Jolene Tan
tweet: In particular, I reject Vivian Balakrishnan's statement that politics & business must be separate & business decisions made only on commercial grounds. "But money can be made" is worse than no excuse if the means of making it cause harm.

“If the situation continues to escalate, there will be serious adverse consequences for Myanmar and the region."   Two people lost their lives today, and yet Singapore's response is no different from Vivian Balakrishnan's statement on 16th February   https://t.co/romgY8Ha5G
